gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Mavericks 131, Magic 129
gameRecap.excerpt: The Mavericks outscored the Magic 70-52 in the second half and won 131-129. Luka Doncic recorded 45 points, 15 assists, and nine rebounds for the Mavericks, with Tim Hardaway Jr. adding 36 points (5-9 3PM) and eight rebounds in the victory. Paolo Banchero tallied 36 points, nine rebounds, and seven assists for the Magic in the losing effort. The Mavericks improve to 26-21, while the Magic fall to 24-23.
